name: bootstrap-4-vertical-tabs
description: Responsive vertical tabs navigation component for Bootstrap 4

scripts.build: npm ci && node-sass --importer node_modules/node-sass-import --output-style compressed  --source-map true index.scss dist/b4vtabs.min.css
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run build-dev
scripts.sri-gen: openssl dgst -sha384 -binary dist/b4vtabs.min.css | openssl base64 -A > dist/sha384.min.txt

author: Tromgy
